parameters.name: ContactChannelId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel you want to update.

parameters.name: DeliveryAddress
parameters.description: The details that Incident Manager uses when trying to engage the contact channel. SimpleAddress (string) --- The format is dependent on the type of the contact channel. The following are the expected formats: SMS - --+' followed by the country code and phone number VOICE - --+' followed by the country code and phone number EMAIL - any standard email format.
